title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: IHG cardholders and elite members: Get 15% off award stays when you book by Sept. 16
items.description: A current IHG One Rewards promotion offers 15% off award stays of up to three nights to members with an eligible IHG credit card or elite status.

items.title: JetBlue announces big Fort Lauderdale expansion, all-new South America destination
items.description: JetBlue is expanding its position in Fort Lauderdale with nine new or returning routes, and bolstering service on nine other routes.

items.title: Avelo Airlines has big expansion plan for US after ordering up to 100 Embraer E2s
items.description: Avelo Airlines has ordered up to 100 Embraer E195-E2s to fuel its growth to small and mid-sized U.S. cities.

items.title: Deal alert: Earn a best-ever $50 bonus by joining Rakuten and shopping online at thousands of retailers
items.description: Here's how new Rakuten members can earn a best-ever $50 cash-back bonus by spending at least $50 at retailers like Walmart, Target, Loweâ€™s and Instaca...

items.title: Alaska Airlines flash sale: Fly to Seoul for 20K Atmos points one-way or BOGO cash fares
items.description: Save cash or Atmos points on Alaska's new nonstop flight from Seattle to Seoul.
